response.overview: A dog, Hudson, hates this time of the year.  While the leaves are blowing in the wind, and the snow begins to fall down from the sky, all of the best smells are about. Hudson however, never gets to enjoy any of them.  Stuck inside on a cold late-autumn day, Hudson desperately tries to get what he desires.
response.tagline: Itâ€™s that weird time, between the orange leaves, and the white ones.
response.title: Weird Time
